positive.review: I played this when i was in middle and high school for 6 or more hours a day. great pvp, does cost little money over time or you can grind it out and earn everything. I just started back playing and man i missed this game! Just needs more english speaking players like the old days.
There is a great community in this game. If you are english speaking there are plenty of players. Come join a growing server
The Great Battle between Karus and El Morad has arrived to Steam! Pledge allegiance to one of the Nations and put your skills to the test in one of the best PvP system in the MMORPG universe!
best game ever

negative.review: i spent years trying to remember the name of this game and I cant login cause it needs a sms code and I never got the code after trying 10+ times. Sadly my hope of playing dies here lol.

Not a game, but a market. Every corner in the game is full of traders in real life. Lots of cheaters in PK. Do not be involved in this game unless you want to spend bunch of money to feel like you are winning among toxic players who see themselves owners of the game for spending on the game.

And... A word for the administration: I applaud you because you've correctly analyzed the characteristics of Turkish players. You are exploiting their addiction and nostalgia feeling perfectly. I guess you've come to the conclusion that no matter how bad you do, the players will be eager to play it anyway without demanding equality because they do not care as long as they spend, win and "show off". Neither the administration nor the players care about having fun, bravo!

The game is not the same as 20 years ago; it has been ruined in every possible way. Never, again!

so sad no one can play any more i miss coming home from school and hoping on here just to play and so on but now you gotta do a ton of crap that dont work just to play it make me sad 

so long knightonline
Neden Macte oynayamiyoruz
You can't delete your account because "hackers"

As an english player its really hard to advance in the game everyone is turkish and nobody shares methods, its all P2W and greed sadly not the game it was 20 years ago. It can be fun up till level 50 then you hit a wall where you have to pay to play basically...
i spent years trying to remember the name of this game and I cant login cause it needs a sms code and I never got the code after trying 10+ times. Sadly my hope of playing dies here lol.
